desc.p: This field allows the user to run a revaluation and only generate the Variation Margins of the contract.
Selecing NO will skip all Initial Margin calculation.
It is not possible to run a revaluation purely for Initial Margin as some initial margin calculations require a variation margin figure.
This option is designed as a time saver.
Input must be YES/NO
If left Null, field will default to YES

The field set ALL.TRADES to CONTRACT idenitify which of the trades for the selected customer should be revalued.
For example, By selecting YES all trades for the CUSTOMER/GROUP or PORTFOLIO will be revalued, or by selecting NO and setting Currency as GBP, only the customers Sterling contracts will be revalued.
No Input if ALL.TRADE field is set to YES
Input must be a valid record on the CURRENCY Application
